item.title: NSO Pegasus Spyware
item.description: ğŸ” NSO Pegasus Spyware ğŸ” What is Pegasus Spyware ? # Over the weekend, news leaked that several authoritarian governments (including Mexico, Morocco and the UAE) used spying software developed by the Israeli company NSO Group .
